GK20hpriydpu:4: paśyantī varam utsukānatamukhī bhūyo hriyā brahmaṇaḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:6: sparśādutpulakā karagrahavidhau Gaurī śivāyāstu vaḥ // HPri_1.1 //
GK20hpriydpu:9: kroḍaṃ mātuḥ Kumāre viśati viṣamuci prekṣamāṇe saroṣam /
GK20hpriydpu:12: kruddho 'py āśliṣṭamūrtir bhayaghanam Umayā pātu tuṣṭaḥ Śivo naḥ // HPri_1.2 //
GK20hpriydpu:15: nānādigdeśād āgatena rājñaḥ śrīHarṣadevasya pādapadmopajīvinā rājasamūhenoktaḥ yathāsmatsvāminā
GK20hpriydpu:16: śrīHarṣadevenāpūrvavasturacanālaṃkṛtā Priyadarśikā nāma [p. 3] nāṭikā kṛtety asmābhiḥ
GK20hpriydpu:19: tat tasyaiva rājñaḥ sarvajanahṛdayāhlādino bahumānād asmāsu cānugrahabuddhyā
GK20hpriydpu:21: tad yāvan nepathyaracanāṃ kṛtvā yathābhilaṣitaṃ saṃpādayāmi /
GK20hpriydpu:24: śrīHarṣo nipuṇaḥ kaviḥ pariṣad apy eṣā guṇagrāhiṇī
GK20hpriydpu:25: loke hāri ca Vatsarājacaritaṃ nāṭye ca dakṣā vayam /
GK20hpriydpu:26: vastv ekaikam apīha vāñchitaphalaprāpteḥ padaṃ kiṃ punar
GK20hpriydpu:27: madbhāgyopacayād ayaṃ samuditaḥ sarvo guṇānāṃ gaṇaḥ // HPri_1.3 //
GK20hpriydpu:30: kathaṃ prastāvanābhyudyate mayi viditāsmadabhiprāyo 'ṅgādhipater Dṛḍhavarmaṇaḥ kañcukino bhūmikāṃ kṛtvāsmadbhrāteta evābhivartate /
GK20hpriydpu:31: tad yāvad aham apy anantarabhūmikāṃ saṃpādayāmi /
GK20hpriydpu:41: āsvādyate 'syāḥ kaṭuniṣphalāyāḥ phalaṃ mayaitac cirajīvitāyāḥ // HPri_1.4 //
GK20hpriydpu:44: matprārthyamānāpy anena svaduhitā Vatsarājāya datteti baddhānuśayena Vatsarājo bandhanān
GK20hpriydpu:45: na nivartata iti ca labdharandhreṇa sahasāgatya Kaliṅgahatakena vipattir īdṛśī kriyata
GK20hpriydpu:46: iti yat satyam upapannam api na śraddadhe /
GK20hpriydpu:47: katham ekāntaniṣṭhuram īdṛśaṃ ca daivam asmāsu /
GK20hpriydpu:48: yena sāpi rājaputrī yathākathaṃcid enāṃ Vatsarājāyopanīya svāminam anṛṇaṃ kariṣyāmīti
GK20hpriydpu:49: matvā mayā tādṛśād api pralayakāladāruṇād avaskandasaṃbhramād apavāhya devasya Dṛḍhavarmaṇo
GK20hpriydpu:50: mitrabhāvānvitasyaivāṭavikasya nṛpater Vindhyaketor gṛhe sthāpitā satī snānāya nātidūram
GK20hpriydpu:51: ity Agastyatīrthaṃ gate mayi kṣaṇāt kair api nipatya hate Vindhyaketau rakṣobhir
GK20hpriydpu:52: iva nirmānuṣīkṛte dagdhe sthāne na jñāyate kasyām avasthāyāṃ vartata iti /
GK20hpriydpu:53: nipuṇaṃ ca vicitam etan mayā sarvaṃ sthānam /
GK20hpriydpu:54: na ca jñātaṃ kiṃ tair eva dasyubhir nītāthavā dagdheti /
GK20hpriydpu:58: śrutaṃ mayā bandhanāt paribhraṣṭaḥ Pradyotatanayām apahṛtya Vatsarājaḥ Kauśāmbīm āgata iti /
GK20hpriydpu:61: kim iva hi rājaputryā vinā tatra gatvā kathayiṣyāmi /
GK20hpriydpu:63: kathitaṃ cādya mama Vindhyaketunā -- mā bhaiṣīḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:64: jīvati tatrabhavān mahārājo Dṛḍhavarmā gāḍhaprahārajarjarīkṛto baddhas tiṣṭhati /
GK20hpriydpu:66: tad adhunā svāminam eva gatvā pādaparicaryayā jīvitaśeṣam ātmanaḥ saphalayiṣyāmi (parikramyordhvam avalokya) /
GK20hpriydpu:70: ravir adhigatasvadhāmā pratapati khalu Vatsarāja iva // HPri_1.5 //
GK20hpriydpu:75: bhṛtyānām avikāritā parigatā dṛṣṭā matir mantriṇāṃ
GK20hpriydpu:78: nirvyājād iva dharmataḥ kim iva na prāptaṃ mayā bandhanāt // HPri_1.6 //
GK20hpriydpu:82: kahaṃ taṃ evva dāsīe uttaṃ bandhaṇahadaaṃ pasaṃsesi /
GK20hpriydpu:88: kathaṃ tam eva dāsyāḥ putraṃ bandhanahatakaṃ praśaṃsasi /
GK20hpriydpu:93: rājā - Vasantaka durjanaḥ khalv asi / paśya /
GK20hpriydpu:95: pīḍā te nigalasvanena madhurās tasyā giro na śrutāḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:96: krūrā bandhanarakṣiṇo 'dya manasi snigdhāḥ kaṭākṣā na te
GK20hpriydpu:97: doṣān paśyasi bandhanasya na punaḥ Pradyotaputryā guṇān // HPri_1.7 //
GK20hpriydpu:100: jai dāva bandhaṇaṃ suhaṇibandhaṇaṃ hoi tā kīsa tumaṃ Diḍhavammā baddho tti Kaliṅgaraṇṇo uvari rosaṃ bandhesi /
GK20hpriydpu:102: yadi tāvad bandhanaṃ sukhanibandhanaṃ bhavati [p. 7] tat kasmāt tvaṃ Dṛḍhavarmā baddha iti Kaliṅgarājasyopari roṣaṃ badhnāsi] /
GK20hpriydpu:105: na khalu sarvo Vatsarājo ya evaṃ Vāsavadattām avāpya bandhanān niryāsyati /
GK20hpriydpu:107: Vindhyaketor upari bahūny ahāni Vijayasenasya preṣitasya na cādyāpi tatsakāśāt kaścid āgataḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:112: eso kkhu Vijaaseṇo amacco Rumaṇṇo vi paḍihārabhūmiṃ uvaṭṭhio /
GK20hpriydpu:114: eṣa khalu Vijayaseno 'mātyo Rumaṇvān api pratīhārabhūmim upasthitau] /
GK20hpriydpu:121: tat kṣanam api niṣkrāntāḥ kṛtadoṣā iva vināpi doṣeṇa /
GK20hpriydpu:122: praviśanti śaṅkamānā rājakulaṃ prāyaśo bhṛtyāḥ // HPri_1.8 //
GK20hpriydpu:142: ito vayaṃ devapādādeśād yathādiṣṭena karituragapadātidainyena mahāntam apy adhvānaṃ divasatrayeṇollaṅghya prabhātavelāyām atarkitā eva Vindhyaketor upari nipatitāḥ smaḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:144: Vijayasenaḥ - tataḥ so 'py asmadbalatumulakalakalākarṇanena pratibuddhaḥ kesarīva
GK20hpriydpu:145: Vindhyakandarān nirgatya Vindhyaketur anapekṣitabalavāhano yathāsaṃnihita katipayasahāyaḥ
GK20hpriydpu:150: Vijayasenaḥ - tato 'smābhir ayam asāv iti dviguṇatarabaddhamatsarotsāhair mahatā vimardena niḥśeṣitasahāya eka eva vimarditādhikabalakrodhavego dāruṇataraṃ saṃprahāram akarot /
GK20hpriydpu:155: pādātaṃ pātter eva prathamataram uraḥpeṣamātreṇa piṣṭvā
GK20hpriydpu:156: dūrān nītvā śaraughair hariṇakulam iva trastam aśvīyam āśāḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:163: śrāntaś cirād vinihato yudhi Vindhyaketuḥ // HPri_1.10 //
GK20hpriydpu:165: satpuruṣocitaṃ mārgam anugacchato yat satyaṃ vrīḍitā eva vayaṃ Vindhyaketor maraṇena /
GK20hpriydpu:166: Rumaṇvān - deva tvadvidhānām evaṃ guṇaikapakṣapātināṃ ripor api guṇāḥ prītiṃ janayanti /
GK20hpriydpu:167: rājā - Vijayasena apy asti Vindhyaketor apatyaṃ yatrāsya paritoṣasya phalaṃ darśayāmi /
GK20hpriydpu:169: evaṃ sabandhuparivāre hate Vindhyaketau tam anusṛtāsu sahadharmacāriṇīṣu Vindhyaśikharāśriteṣu
GK20hpriydpu:170: janapadeṣu śūnyībhūte tatsthāne hā tāta hā mātaḥ iti kṛtakṛpaṇapralāpā Vindhyaketor
GK20hpriydpu:171: veśmany ābhijātyānurūpā kanyakā tadduhitety asmābhir ānītā dvāri tiṣṭhati /
GK20hpriydpu:179: yadā varayogyā bhaviṣyati tadā māṃ smārayeti /
GK20hpriydpu:189: aye kathaṃ nabhomadhyam adhyāste bhagavān sahasradīdhitiḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:192: chatrābhaṃ nṛttalīlāśithilam api śikhī barhabhāraṃ tanoti /
GK20hpriydpu:195: sadyas tyaktvā kapolaṃ viśati madhukaraḥ karṇapālīṃ gajasya // HPri_1.12 //
GK20hpriydpu:197: praviśyābhyantaram eva kṛtayathocitakriyāḥ satkṛtya Vijayasenaṃ Kaliṅgocchittaye preṣayāmaḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:200: vidūṣakaḥ - ṇaṃ bhaṇido mhi Indīvariāe jaha ajja uvavāsaṇiamaṭṭhiā devī Vāsavadattā sotthivāaṇaṇimittaṃ saddāvedi tti /
GK20hpriydpu:201: tā jāva dhārāgharujjāṇadigghiāe ṇhāia devīpāsaṃ gadua kukkuṭavādaṃ karissaṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:205: kahaṃ eso piavaasso ajja devīe virahukkaṇṭhaviṇodaṇāṇimittaṃ dhārāgharujjāṇe evva patthido /
GK20hpriydpu:206: tā jāva vaasseṇa saha evva gadua jahodidaṃ aṇuciṭṭhissaṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:207: [nanu bhaṇito 'smīndivarikayā yathā upavāsaniyamasthitā devī Vāsavadattā svastivācananimittaṃ śabdāyateti /
GK20hpriydpu:208: tad yāvad dhārāgṛhodyānadīrghikāyāṃ snātvā devīpārśvaṃ gatvā kukkuṭavādaṃ kariṣyāmi /
GK20hpriydpu:209: anyathā katham asmābhiḥ sadṛśā brāhmaṇā rājakule pratigrahaṃ kurvanti (nepathyābhimukham avalokya)
GK20hpriydpu:210: katham eṣa priyavayasyo 'dya devyā virahotkaṇṭhāvinodanānimittaṃ dhārāgṛhodyānam eva prasthitaḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:211: tad yāvad vayasyena sahaiva gatvā yathoditam anuṣṭhāsyāmi /]
GK20hpriydpu:218: tāṃ draṣṭuṃ prathamānurāgajanitāvasthām ivādya priyām // HPri_2.1 //
GK20hpriydpu:230: īriso kkhu bamhaṇo jo cauvvedapañcavedachaṭṭhavedabamhaṇasahassapajjāule rāaule paḍhamaṃ (Kale : pu)
GK20hpriydpu:234: yaś caturvedapañcavedaṣaḍvedabrāhmaṇasahasraparyākule rjakule prathamam aham eva devīsakāśāt svastivācanaṃ labhe /]
GK20hpriydpu:255: rājā - vayasya sādhv abhihitam / atra hi /
GK20hpriydpu:256: vṛntaiḥ kṣudrapravālasthagitam iva talaṃ bhāti śephālikānāṃ
GK20hpriydpu:259: gāyanty avyaktavācaḥ kim api madhuliho vāruṇīpānamattāḥ // HPri_2.2 //
GK20hpriydpu:262: jo eso aviralapaḍantakusumaṇiaro ajja vi pattantaragaḷantavarisāvasāṇasalilabindū via lakkhīadi [p. 14] sattavaṇṇapāāvo /
GK20hpriydpu:263: [bho vayasya etad api tāvat paśya paśya /
GK20hpriydpu:264: ya eṣo 'viralapatadkusumanikaro 'dyāpi patrāntaragaladvarṣāvasānasalilabindur iva lakṣyate saptaparṇapādapaḥ /]
GK20hpriydpu:266: bahv eva sadṛśaṃ jaladasamayasya / tathā hi /
GK20hpriydpu:270: adyāpi kṣitir indragopakaśataiś cchanneva saṃlakṣyate // HPri_2.3 //
GK20hpriydpu:273: hanje Indīvarie ajja mae Agatthimahesiṇo aggho dādavvo /
GK20hpriydpu:276: esā vi Āraṇṇiā dhārāgharujjāṇadīhiāe jāva evva viāsiāiṃ kamalāiṃ ṇa atthāhilāsiṇā [p. 15] sujjeṇa maulāvijjanti tāva evva lahuaṃ avaciṇua āacchadu tti /
GK20hpriydpu:277: esā tavassiṇī taṃ dīhiaṃ ṇa jāṇādi /
GK20hpriydpu:285: eṣāpy Āraṇyikā dhārāgṛhodyānadīrghikāyā yāvad eva vikasitāni kamalāni nāstābhilāṣiṇā sūryeṇa mukulāyyante tāvad eva laghv avacintyāgacchatv iti /
GK20hpriydpu:286: eṣā tapasvinī tāṃ dīrghikāṃ na jānāti /
GK20hpriydpu:290: taha ṇāma tārise vaṃse uppaṇṇāe aṇṇajaṇaṃ āṇṇāvia ṭṭhiyāe saṃpadaṃ parassa mae āṇattī kādavvetti ṇatthi kkhu dukkharaṃ devvassa /
GK20hpriydpu:291: ahavā maha evva eso doso jeṇa jāṇantīe vi ṇa vāvādio appā /
GK20hpriydpu:294: varaṃ evva edaṃ vi ṇa uṇa appaṇo mahagghaṃ vaṃsaṃ paāsaantīe lahūkido appā /
GK20hpriydpu:298: tathā nāma tādṛśe vaṃśa utpannayānyajanam ājñāpya sthitayā sāṃprataṃ parasya mayājñaptiḥ kartavyeti nāsti khalu duṣkaraṃ daivasya /
GK20hpriydpu:299: athavā mamaivaiṣa doṣo yena jānatyāpi na vyāpādita ātmā /
GK20hpriydpu:303: na punar ātmano mahārghaṃ vaṃśaṃ prakāśayantyā mayā laghūkṛta ātmā /
GK20hpriydpu:310: hanje dūre kiṃ ajja vi digghiā /
GK20hpriydpu:320: rājā - vayasya kim anyad iva cintayasi /
GK20hpriydpu:321: nanu bravīmi bahv eva sadṛśaṃ jaladasamayasyeti /
GK20hpriydpu:324: bho tumaṃ dāva edaṃ aṇṇaṃ a pekkhanto ukkaṇṭhaṇibbharaṃ viṇodesi appāṇaṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:326: tā jāva ahaṃ tuvariaṃ dīhiāe ṇhāia devīe saāsaṃ gamissaṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:327: [(sakrodham) bhoḥ tvaṃ tāvad etad anyac ca paśyann utkaṇṭhānirbharaṃ vinodayasyātmānam /
GK20hpriydpu:329: tad yāvad ahaṃ tvaritaṃ dīrghikāyāṃ snātvā devyāḥ sakāśaṃ gamiṣyāmi /]
GK20hpriydpu:331: rājā -nanu mūrkha pāraṃgatā eva vayaṃ dīrghikāyāḥ /
GK20hpriydpu:332: evam anekendriyasukhātiśayam anubhavann api nopalakṣayasi / paśya /
GK20hpriydpu:336: gātrāṇāṃ hlādam ete vidadhati maruto vārisaṃparkaśītāḥ // HPri_2.4 //
GK20hpriydpu:341: dṛṣṭir iva dīrghikeyaṃ ramayati māṃ darśanenaiva // HPri_2.5 //
GK20hpriydpu:344: kā esā kusumaparimalasuandhaveṇīmahuarāvalī viddumalaāruṇahatthapallavā ujjalantataṇukomalabāhuladā saccaṃ paccakkhacarī via ujjāṇadevadā itthiā dīsai /
GK20hpriydpu:347: kaiṣā kusumaparimalasugandhaveṇimadhukarāvalir vidrumalatāruṇahastapallavā ujjvalattanukomalabāhulatā satyaṃ pratyakṣacarīvodyānadevatā strī dṛśyate /]
GK20hpriydpu:350: yat satyam aham api nāvagacchāmi / paśya /
GK20hpriydpu:353: mithyā tat khalu dṛṣṭam eva hi mayā tasmin kuto 'stīdṛśī /
GK20hpriydpu:354: mūrtā syād iha kaumudī na ghaṭate tasyā divā darśanaṃ
GK20hpriydpu:355: keyaṃ hastatalasthitena kamalenālokyate śrīr iva // HPri_2.6 //
GK20hpriydpu:365: ahaṃ vi edassiṃ ṇaliṇīpattammi sehāliākusumāīṃ avaiṇua devīsaāsaṃ gamissaṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:368: aham apy etasmin nalinīpatre śephālikākusumāny avacitya devīsakāśaṃ gamiṣyāmi /]
GK20hpriydpu:373: Āraṇyikā - halā Indīvarie ṇa sakkuṇomi tue viṇā muhuttaṃ vi ettha āsiduṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:375: na śaknomi tvayā vinā muhūrtam apy atrāsitum /]
GK20hpriydpu:377: jādisaṃ ajja mae devīe mantidaṃ sudaṃ tāriseṇa ciraṃ evva mae viṇā tue āsidavvaṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:378: [(vihasya) yādṛśam adya mayā devyā mantritaṃ śrutaṃ tādṛśena ciram eva mayā vinā tvayāsitavyam /]
GK20hpriydpu:383: ceṭī - evaṃ / tadā esā ahaṃ mahārāeṇa bhaṇidā jaha jadā esā Viñjhakeduduhidā varajoggā bhavissadi tadā ahaṃ sumarāidavvetti /
GK20hpriydpu:384: tā saṃpadaṃ sumarāvemi jeṇa se varacintāpajjāulo bhavissadi /
GK20hpriydpu:386: tadaiṣāhaṃ mahārājena bhaṇitā yathā yadaiṣā Vindhyaketuduhitā varayogyā bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ smārayitavya iti /
GK20hpriydpu:387: tat sāṃprataṃ mahārājaṃ smārayāmi yenāsyā varacintāparyākulo bhaviṣyati /]
GK20hpriydpu:399: rājā - aho sutarāṃ prakaṭīkṛtam ābhijātyaṃ dhīratayā /
GK20hpriydpu:400: vayasya dhanyaḥ khalv asau ya etad aṅgasparśasukhabhājanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK20hpriydpu:404: esā salilacalantakarapallavappahāvitthideṇa ohasiasohaṃ karedi kamalavaṇaṃ avaciṇantī /
GK20hpriydpu:412: asyāś candramasas tanor iva karasparśāspadatvaṃ gatā
GK20hpriydpu:413: naite yan mukulībhavanti sahasā padmās tad evādbhutam // HPri_2.7 //
GK20hpriydpu:416: ede kkhu avare pariccaia kamaliṇiṃ ṇīluppalavaṇāiṃ samāpaḍantā ṇiuṇaaraṃ bādhantā āāsaanti maṃ duṭṭhamahuarā /
GK20hpriydpu:418: halā Indīvarie parittāehi maṃ parittāehi maṃ /
GK20hpriydpu:422: ete khalv apare parityajya kamalinīṃ nīlotpalavanāni samāpatanto nipuṇataraṃ bādhamānā āyāsayanti māṃ (uttarīyeṇa mukhaṃ pidhāya sabhayam)
GK20hpriydpu:423: halā Indīvarike paritrāyasva māṃ paritrāyasva mām /
GK20hpriydpu:425: vidūṣakaḥ - bho vaassa puṇṇā de maṇorahā /
GK20hpriydpu:426: jāva evva gabbhadāsīe sudā ṇa āacchadi dāva evva tumaṃ vi tuṇhīko bhavia uvasappa /
GK20hpriydpu:427: esā vi salilasaddasūideṇa paasaṃcāreṇa Indīvariā āacchadi tti jāṇia tumaṃ evva olambissadi /
GK20hpriydpu:429: yāvad eva garbhadāsyāḥ sutā nāgacchati tāvad eva tvam api tūṣṇīko bhūtvopasarpa /
GK20hpriydpu:430: eṣāpi salilaśabdasūcitena padasaṃcāreṇendīvarikāgacchatīti jñātvā tvām evāvalambiṣyate /]
GK20hpriydpu:441: Āraṇyikottarīyaṃ mukhād apanīya rājānam apaśyantī bhramarāvalokanaṃ nāṭayati)
GK20hpriydpu:443: ayi visṛja viṣādaṃ bhīru bhṛṅgās tavaite
GK20hpriydpu:446: kuvalayavanalakṣmīṃ tat kutas tvāṃ tyajanti // HPri_2.8 //
GK20hpriydpu:456: vidūṣakaḥ - hodi saalapuḍhavīparittāṇasamattheṇa Vaccharāeṇa parittāantī ceḍiṃ Indīvariaṃ akkandasi /
GK20hpriydpu:457: [bhavati sakalapṛthvīparitrāṇasamarthena Vatsarājena paritrāyamāṇā ceṭīm Indīvarikām ākrandasi /]
GK20hpriydpu:460: aaṃ kkhu so mahārāo jassa ahaṃ tādeṇa diṇṇā /
